amendatorysection.catchline: Imprisonment for fine and costs; hard labor.
amendatorysection.para: When the convict is adjudged to be imprisoned for fines or costs, as provided for in section 29-2206, the sentence and execution may require the imprisonment to be at hard labor.

crossreference.para: Imprisonment at hard labor, see sections 29-2208, 29-2414, and 29-2415.
